## Welcome! New site, same content

  <img src="homepage.jpg" />

Enhance your French writing skills with À Vos Plumes! We provide resources for students aiming to improve their writing in French and offer valuable tools for teachers dedicated to guiding them on their linguistic journey. 

Read our [About](about.qmd) page to see how far our site has come.


## Featured Exercises

Check out our [Practice Exercises](students.qmd) along with our [Grammar Videos](understand-grammar.qmd) and [Resources](resources.qmd) to help you on your French learning journey.
